verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to you who <S%H7703>destroy,<s%> but you <S%H7703>weren't<s%> destroyed; and who <S%H898>betray,<s%> but nobody <S%H898>betrayed<s%> <S%H8552>you!<s%> When you have finished <S%H7703>destroying,<s%> you will be <S%H7703>destroyed;<s%> and when you have made an <S%H5239>end<s%> of <S%H898>betrayal,<s%> you will be <S%H898>betrayed.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H6960>us.<s%> We have waited for <S%H2220>you.<s%> Be our strength every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> our <S%H3444>salvation<s%> also in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>
At the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H1995>thunder,<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> have <S%H5074>fled.<s%> When you lift yourself <S%H7427>up,<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H5310>scattered.<s%>
Your <S%H7998>spoil<s%> will be <S%H622>gathered<s%> as the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> <S%H625>gathers.<s%> Men will <S%H4944>leap<s%> on it as <S%H1357>locusts<s%> <S%H8264>leap.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted,<s%> for he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> on <S%H4791>high.<s%> He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

There will be <S%H530>stability<s%> in your <S%H6256>times,<s%> <S%H2633>abundance<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%> The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is your <S%H214>treasure.<s%>
<S%H691>Behold,<s%> their valiant ones <S%H6817>cry<s%> <S%H2351>outside;<s%> the <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

The <S%H4546>highways<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate.<s%> The traveling <S%H5674>man<s%> <S%H7673>ceases.<s%> The <S%H1285>covenant<s%> is <S%H6565>broken.<s%> He has <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H5892>cities.<s%> He <S%H2803>doesn't<s%> respect <S%H582>man.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns<s%> and <S%H535>languishes.<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> is <S%H2659>confounded<s%> and withers <S%H7060>away.<s%> <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> is like a <S%H6160>desert,<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> are stripped <S%H5287>bare.<s%>
"Now I will <S%H6965>arise,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> "Now I will lift myself <S%H5375>up.<s%> Now I will be <S%H5375>exalted.<s%>
You will <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H2842>chaff.<s%> You will bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H7179>stubble.<s%> Your <S%H7307>breath<s%> is a <S%H784>fire<s%> that will devour <S%H398>you.<s%>
The <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will be like the burning of <S%H7875>lime,<s%> like <S%H6975>thorns<s%> that are cut <S%H3683>down<s%> and <S%H3341>burned<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> you who are far <S%H7350>off,<s%> what I have <S%H6213>done;<s%> <S%H7138>and,<s%> you who are near, <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H1369>might.<s%>"

The <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H6342>afraid.<s%> <S%H6342>Trembling<s%> has <S%H270>seized<s%> the <S%H2611>godless<s%> <S%H1481>ones.<s%> Who among us can live with the <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire?<s%> Who among us can <S%H1481>live<s%> with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4168>burning?<s%>

He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H6666>righteously,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H4339>blamelessly;<s%> He who <S%H3988>despises<s%> the <S%H1215>gain<s%> of <S%H4642>oppressions,<s%> who <S%H5287>gestures<s%> with his <S%H3709>hands,<s%> refusing to <S%H8551>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> who <S%H331>stops<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> from <S%H8085>hearing<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H6105>shuts<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>looking<s%> at <S%H7451>evil<s%>â€”

he will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high.<s%> His place of <S%H4869>defense<s%> will be the <S%H4679>fortress<s%> of <S%H5553>rocks.<s%> His <S%H3899>bread<s%> will be <S%H5414>supplied.<s%> His <S%H4325>waters<s%> will be <S%H539>sure.<s%>
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in his <S%H3308>beauty.<s%> They will <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4801>distant<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Your <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on the <S%H367>terror.<s%> Where is he who <S%H5608>counted?<s%> Where is he who <S%H8254>weighed?<s%> Where is he who <S%H5608>counted<s%> the <S%H4026>towers?<s%>

You will no longer <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3267>fierce<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>deep<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> that you <S%H8085>can't<s%> comprehend, with a <S%H3932>strange<s%> <S%H3956>language<s%> that you <S%H998>can't<s%> understand.

<S%H2372>Look<s%> at <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of our appointed <S%H4150>festivals.<s%> Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> a <S%H7600>quiet<s%> <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> that <S%H6813>won't<s%> be removed. Its <S%H3489>stakes<s%> will <S%H5331>never<s%> be <S%H5265>plucked<s%> <S%H2256>up,<s%> nor will any of its cords be <S%H5423>broken.<s%>

But there <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be with us in <S%H117>majesty,<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> and <S%H2975>streams,<s%> in which <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H590>galley<s%> with <S%H7885>oars<s%> will <S%H3212>go,<s%> neither will any <S%H117>gallant<s%> <S%H6716>ship<s%> pass by <S%H5674>there.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is our <S%H8199>judge.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is our <S%H2710>lawgiver.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is our <S%H4428>king.<s%> He will save <S%H3467>us.<s%>

Your <S%H2256>rigging<s%> is <S%H5203>untied.<s%> They <S%H2388>couldn't<s%> strengthen the <S%H3653>foot<s%> of their <S%H8650>mast.<s%> They <S%H6566>couldn't<s%> spread the <S%H5251>sail.<s%> Then the <S%H5706>prey<s%> of a <S%H4766>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> was <S%H2505>divided.<s%> The <S%H6455>lame<s%> <S%H962>took<s%> the <S%H957>prey.<s%>
The <S%H7934>inhabitant<s%> <S%H559>won't<s%> say, "I am <S%H2470>sick.<s%>" The <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein will be <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
